articles.author: Andrew Greif
articles.title: The Pacers' lead in the NBA Finals was more than a decade in the making - NBC News
articles.description: Indiana coach Rick Carlisle learned to relinquish control of his teams' offense. It's helped the Pacers take control against Oklahoma City.
articles.content: OKLAHOMA CITY Every answer to what has become the most-asked question in the NBA how exactly the Indiana Pacers continue to pull off one improbable postseason comeback after another must include the … [+7390 chars]
